Articles.Content:
I want to install the planet pack called SLIPPIST-1 but im not sure if it will work with 1.11 as it hasnt been updated since 1.7.3

Please help!

The best way to find out is to try it and see. There”s no fixed rule about these things as they depend on so many different factors, so actually installing it and checking if it works or not is the only way to be sure.
Besides trying it yourself, you can also try to read the last page or two of the planet pack's forum post and see if anyone else has posted if it works for them or not.
If it does fail, Make sure that the pack is running with the most recent version of Kopernicus (as often the only things that change in updates are textures and more planets)
